name: The Bee-Side Bar
description:
Welcome to the Bee-Side Bar, the fine after-work establishment of choice for the worker bees of the hive. As the well known Bee-tender, your job is to keep customers happy by serving them drinks, focusing on speed and accuracy. Fix an assortment of drinks and try and make as much money as you can before the bar gets overwhelmed by customers!

HOW TO PLAY:

Take orders from customers, head over to the Drink Station and craft them a fine beverage! Click & Drag ingredients to the platform, the juicer or the blender to add them to the drink!

This game was created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam, with the theme "Joined Together"
